UI: Content Card

Profile Card

The Profile Card displays team members, author bios, speaker profiles, and customer testimonials. Features job title, organization, bio, location, skills/expertise tags, and contact information (email, phone, social links). Uses Schema.org/Person markup.

About

Sarah specializes in accessibility-first design and has led the redesign of multiple award-winning web applications. She's a frequent speaker at design conferences and mentors junior developers.
